Name: Christmas Movie Bingo
About the game: It's time to cozy up by the fireplace, grab some friends and family, put on a Christmas movie, and prepare to get a Christmas Movie Bingo! Christmas Movie Bingo will generate a bingo card for each person watching - Instead of numbers, each space is its own Christmas movie trope, and your goal is to be the first player to notice enough of them to fill 5-in-a-row. All you need to do is provide the video! It's simple to use, easy to get into, and it's a great way to add a little something extra to the experience. And you can play using phones, tablets, or laptops! The game even works over a Zoom, so you can still enjoy it even if everyone can't be in the same space. Get it today and experience a new way to Bingo!
